rrick Crivens was one of the inhabitants of Reithwin, once a Sel√ªnite town in the Western Heartlands, sometime before the late 14 century DR.
Errick Crivens perished sometime before the fall of Reithwin and it being consumed by the Shadow-cursed Lands before the . He was buried in Reithwins graveyard behind the House of Healing. His tombstone read "Here rests Errick Crivens, sole inheritor of the Crivens family. May the gods forgive him." Erricks grave marker remained undamaged as of the .
